fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, force a host-error to occur to target player. The host must process their actions incorrectly (ex: ability is used on a random target), then correct it later as if it were a host-error. The player may specify what type of host error is desired (ie: no night messages)
- At night, instead you may force a host-error on the day-announcement, changing who is said to have died and to what causes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If the host makes a host-error in your game not due to this role, they get the banned role.
